question: You are having a party and want to invite your friend from a different city.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Describe why you are having the partyGive directions on how to get to the venueSuggest how you can accommodate him/herWrite at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:
text: I hope you are doing well. I am glad to invite you to the party arranged on 10th September at Hotel Novotel. I am inviting all our college mates.

As you know I  started my PHD course in economics after completing my master's. I am very pleased to inform you that I have completed my PhD with a distiction grade and I have been selected as an outstanding performer by the university. In addition, One of the employers already offered me a job and asked me to join the company from 1st October. I want to celebrate this happiness with all my well-wishers.
You have to take the train to City Stop and from that take  bus No-225 towards Great Avenue. The hotel Novotel is just opposite the Bus Stop.
I have invited 10 friends and booked 5 hotel-sharing rooms. You have to just give your details to reception and they will take care of all. I have already paid all the relevant expenses.
